verbs.description: [V: remains] [ARG3: of delmar pilot] shot down over vietnam coming home a few days before david kibbey 8th birthday a dark blue sedan drove up to his childhood home in vero beach fla during the vietnam war every military family dreaded dark sedans fifty years later kibbey can recall the cold fear sweep over him i wondered if my dad was dead kibbey said the answer would be more complicated
